SS gets shot in the wing and starts to nose dive, but
barely manages to pull up and returns fire.

--- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote:
> The base's autoguns continued firing on both
> intruders. The 
> defensive computer sent a general maximal alert,
> indicating that 
> the ship was under attack.Shadow Star's fire
> penetrated a little and 
> heated the surface of the base.
> This time, Burrock managed to dodge all shots
> directed at him. He 
> opened fire with his spikes, this time coating them
> with acid. Some of 
> the shots went through and started to slowly corrode
> the armor, but 
> most didn't
> 
> Burrock: That's it! We'll take them out slowly, but
> we will!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > SS did loop-d-loops and other manuvers to avoid
> being
> > shot and breathed fire on it again.
> > 
> > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > OOC: I'll post for the base.
> > > 
> > > Burrock fired again with his spikes, and lashed
> at
> > > the shields with 
> > > his tendrils. At this time, they weakened and
> could
> > > only stop half of 
> > > the shots they received. At that moment, the
> > > autoguns came alive and 
> > > two of them targeted Burrock, while one directed
> > > itself towards Shadow 
> > > Star. Moving to avoid the shots, the Worm-bot
> got
> > > wounded to his right 
> > > leg and one of his tendrils.
> > > 
> > > Burrock: Stupid freaking autodefenses!!! I don't
> > > care what the boss 
> > > wnated to do, but I'm gonna scrap their sentry
> guns
> > > right away!
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > wrote:
> > > > SS:  Let's hope not, I was under the
> impression
> > > Tyreal
> > > > wanted to form and alliance with these
> Maximals,
> > > not
> > > > blow them to bits......well not immediately
> > > anyway.
> > > > 
> > > > He breathed another stream of fire.
> > > > 
> > > > OOC:  Are the shield down yet?
> > > > 
> > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > Burrock: Ya really think there's anyone
> here?
> > > > > 
> > > > > He fires spikes again, hoping to pierce the
> > > base's
> > > > > shield so he could 
> > > > > fire acidic spikes on the building itself.
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > SS breathed a massive stream of fire on it
> > > again.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...>
> wrote:
> > > > > > > Burrock would have smiled if his worm
> form
> > > > > allowed
> > > > > > > him to.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Burrock: I heard that! HERE I AM!
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > He transformed while digging up, which
> made
> > > the
> > > > > > > ground fly up in the 
> > > > > > > air around him. Immediately, he started
> > > > > attacking
> > > > > > > with his four 
> > > > > > > tendrils, trying to knock something off
> the
> > > > > base,
> > > > > > > and fired many small 
> > > > > > > spikes from his left fist.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Burrock: Let them taste my fury!
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > > > > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > > > > wrote:

> > > > > > > >
